p: Poxviruses areoval-to-brick-shaped double-stranded DNA viruses of family Poxviridae that range in size from 200 to 400 nm [ 2]. Viruses within genus that cause human disease include cowpox virus (CPXV), monkeypox virus (MPXV), vaccinia virus (VACV), and variola virus (VARV), the etiologic agent of smallpox [ 18].
